**Företagsbeskrivning**
 På Segula Technologies IT-avdelning i Stockholm erbjuds du möjligheten att arbeta med innovativa och tekniskt avancerade lösningar. Vi fokuserar på att leverera högkvalitativa tjänster inom programmering, automatiserade CI/CD-pipelines och molnbaserade lösningar med plattformar som AWS, Azure och GCP. Som konsult hos oss har du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande kunduppdrag och teamprojekt, där du kan påverka och utvecklas i linje med dina ambitioner. Vi söker nu engagerade och skickliga lokala talanger för att stärka vårt växande team.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Jobbeskrivning
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Utveckla robust och högkvalitativ kod.
* Delta aktivt i teamarbete, dela kunskap och bidra till gemensamma framgångar.
* Föreslå förbättringar av lösningar och erbjuda konsultativ rådgivning till våra kunder.


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* En examen (B.Sc. eller M.Sc.) inom relevant område.
* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, med fokus på språk som Java, C# or C++.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av molnplattformar som AWS, Azure eller GCP.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines, Git, Jenkins/Gitlab, Artifactory and Ansible.
* Containerization e.g. Kubernetes, Docker eller OpenShift.
* Goda kunskaper om REST, JSON, XML och mikroservicearkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av SQL, TSQL och RDBMS.
* Flytande engelska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande Kvalifikationer**
* Erfarenhet av språk som Python och .NET.
* Vana av att arbeta med agila metoder.
* Kunskap om webbutvecklingstekniker som JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, Angular och React.
* Erfarenhet av ramverk som Spring, Spring Boot och Java EE.
* Förståelse för design-principer.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska språket är starkt önskvärt.
* Kunskap inom mjukvarutestning och verifiering, inklusive enhetstester och verktyg som Selenium and Sonarqube.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du är:
   

  

* En lagspelare med förmåga att leda och strukturera arbetet för att nå högt ställda mål.
* Serviceinriktad och lösningsorienterad med ett genuint intresse för teknik.
* Självdriven, kreativ och engagerad i att leverera bästa möjliga resultat.
* Kommunikativ och van att samarbeta med kollegor från olika bakgrunder och kulturer.


**Ytterligare information**
 På Segula Technologies värdesätter vi mångfald och strävar efter att skapa en inkluderande arbetsplats. Vi uppmuntrar sökande med olika erfarenheter och bakgrunder. För denna roll krävs att du har ett giltigt arbetstillstånd inom EU. Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

**Ansök nu och bli en del av vårt innovativa team i Stockholm!**
 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

title: (Associate) Data Centre Cloud Solution Architect  – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its
 **Group Corporate Services Directorate – Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO), Platforms & Services Department (P&S), Infrastructure Services Division (IS), Network & Data Centre Unit (NDC)** 
 at its headquarters in Luxembourg, an
 **(Associate) Data Centre Cloud Solution Architect\*.**
**This is a full time position at grade 4/5 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
* internal benchmark: (Associate) Engineer IT Technology & Infrastructure


*Panel interviews are anticipated for end of September 2024.*
 Purpose
   

  

 Are you passionate about cloud technology and eager to help shape the future of cloud infrastructure? Join us as an (Associate) Data Centre Cloud Solution Architect and become a key player in our cloud journey! We're looking for someone who thrives on overcoming challenges and is ready to support us through our cloud migration journey.
   

  

 In this role, you'll manage our technology roadmap for comprehensive cloud infrastructure services, leveraging industry-leading platforms such as AWS and Azure. You'll lead architecture design and oversee project delivery while ensuring cost-effective and efficient use of cloud resources. Your work will drive innovation, enhance operational excellence, and optimize performance, directly contributing to the achievement of the EIB Group objectives.
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 You will report directly to the Head of the Network and Data Centre Unit. You will work in close collaboration with variety of IT teams in particular with infrastructure and application teams. This dynamic role not only offers the opportunity to impact our digital landscape but also enables you to engage with diverse teams and projects.
   

  

**What Will You Do**
* Lead Cloud migration projects, take charge of end-to-end cloud migration projects, ensuring everything runs smoothly, on time, and within budget, while maintaining top-notch quality
* Regularly connect with stakeholders to gather their needs, make sure they’re accurately translated into technical solutions, and keep everyone in the loop with consistent updates
* Work closely with technical teams to design and implement effective cloud migration strategies
* Oversee the daily operations of our cloud services, ensuring everything runs smoothly, performs optimally, and any issues are quickly resolved
* Keep an eye on cloud service health metrics, and act swiftly to resolve any performance issues or disruptions
* Implement and maintain cloud best practices throughout the organization, ensuring top-tier service resilience, security, and compliance
* Act as the main point of contact for all infrastructure cloud service-related questions, concerns, and issues, ensuring prompt and effective resolutions
* Work closely with vendors and third-party providers to ensure optimal service delivery, support, and enhancements
* Continuously assess, research, and integrate the latest cloud technologies, tools, and services to keep us competitive and ensure operational excellence


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in computer science, information technology or related disciplines
* At least 3 years of experience delivering IT Infrastructure Services with exposure to building, maintaining, and securing cloud technologies, cloud platform operations and cloud governance.
* Experience working with public, hybrid and on-premises private clouds
* Experience in on-premises infrastructure related technologies (compute, storage and backup and recovery)
* Experience of delivering IT cloud infrastructure projects and transformation programs, including rollouts would be considered an advantage
* Experience on troubleshooting cloud infrastructure issues.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*), with a good command of the other. (Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage).


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

*(\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

**Deadline for applications:** 
 This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open position. The campaign will remain open until the position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.

title: Senior Service Desk Agent
description:
Till ett uppdrag hos en kund i Stockholm söker vi en tekniker med stort driv som vill vara med och påverka vår kunds fortsatta tillväxt med ett kreativt och positivt arbetsklimat.
   

  

 Tjänsten börjar som ett konsultuppdrag men tanken är att anställningen senare ska gå över till kunden.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Du kommer att arbeta som Senior Service desk Agent inom IT-support och drift. Kunden har en bred IT-miljö med höga säkerhetskrav på system och funktioner. Servicedesken hanterar både 1:st och 2:nd line ärenden på en mycket bred nivå - allt från lösenordsbyte, hård -och mjukvarusupport, klientsupport och applikationssupport till felsökning och administration av servrar, koordinering och kontakt med 3:e parts leverantörer. Rollen ställer höga krav på service och kundbemötande.
   

  

 Utöver en mycket trevlig arbetsplats med högt i tak och konstruktiva dialoger finns stora möjligheter att visa framfötter och växa i sin roll. Du kommer att arbeta proaktivt för att skapa hög tillgänglighet och förbättra kundens IT-miljö.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 Vi söker dig med minst 5 års erfarenhet inom liknande arbetsuppgifter. Din förmåga att arbeta affärsmässigt och bygga relationer är oerhört viktig. Du finner glädje i att ge råd och stöd och därmed kan bidra till utveckling. Att du brinner för service och "det lilla extra" samt att du alltid har kunden i fokus är ett måste.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* Mycket god administrativ kunskap om AD, Azure AD, MS365, ärendehanteringsprocess, dokumentation/uppföljning
* Relevant erfarenhet på minst 5 år och trivs i rollen som en servicedeskmedarbetare
* Mycket goda kunskaper gällande server, nätverk, klient och molnlösningar
* Självgående
* God förmåga att finna vägar till rätt lösning
* God analytisk förmåga och kvalitetsmedveten
* Ha lätt för att lära dig nya saker och processer relaterade till IT och tjänsten
* Kunna flytande svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Linköping och Örebro. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Information Architect
description:
**Do you want to be part of a team that is developing tomorrow's businesses and organizations? At PwC, we strive to be proactive advisors that really make a difference in society. We see that experience and knowledge are invaluable assets, so it's crucial to us that you contribute with your expertise to promote PwC's development. Together, we create a meaningful and rewarding career for you.**
 A career in Information Technology, within Internal Firm Services, will provide you with the opportunity to support our core business functions by deploying applications that enable our people to work more efficiently and deliver the highest levels of service to our clients. You’ll focus on managing the design and implementation of technology infrastructure within PwC, developing and enhancing both client and internal facing applications within PwC, and providing technology tools that help create a competitive advantage for the Firm to drive strategic business growth.
   

  

**Are you our new colleague in IT?**
 PwC Sweden is seeking a dedicated Information Architect to join our team. This role is pivotal in driving data governance, ensuring data quality, and establishing robust data management practices. If you have a passion for data accuracy, governance, and compliance, and are skilled in information architecture, we invite you to be a part of our journey in shaping a data-driven future.
   

  

**Your main tasks as an Information Architect**
* Drive the collection and maintenance of data objects from global systems and local applications, ensuring high data quality and governance.
* Establish and maintain data governance frameworks to uphold organizational data quality, consistency, and accuracy.
* Assist in identifying and defining data mappings, models, scopes, and flows for integration solutions.
* Ensure data quality in integration solutions, identifying and resolving data quality issues.
* Facilitate the review and definition of data object boundaries across various domains.
* Provide insights into data availability and structure, establishing data cataloging and metadata management practices.
* Define and align data architecture with integration architecture and principles.
* Create and maintain territory data models and assist in developing a canonical data model for data exchange.
* Uphold PwC's standards for ID management, data retention, anonymization, and network data policies.
* Support the implementation of Data Access controls and work closely with Integration Architects for correct data integration and sharing.
* Define and maintain road map for the information domain
* Work with both local and local IT-leaders (GCDO, CDO, CIO, EA and more)


**Qualifications For The Position**
* Proven experience in Information Architecture, preferably in a large organization or consultancy.
* Strong understanding of data governance, quality assurance, and data management principles.
* Experience in establishing data governance frameworks and data cataloging practices.
* Knowledge of data policy compliance and data integration standards.
* Excellent collaboration skills and the ability to work closely with various architectural roles, as well as other colleagues within IT and stakeholders outside of IT.
* Effective communication skills, capable of conveying complex data concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Preferably strong familiarity with Microsoft Azure as a solution platform


**What We Offer**
* A challenging and fulfilling role at the forefront of data governance and quality assurance.
* The opportunity to contribute significantly to data-driven decision-making processes within PwC Sweden.
* A collaborative and supportive work environment with opportunities for professional growth.


 In this role, you will be crucial in ensuring that our data assets are accurate, reliable, and compliant, contributing to the overall integrity and efficiency of our data systems.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Recruitment Process**
 We will review applications continuously, and the position may be filled earlier than the application deadline.
   

  

**Please Attach The Following Documents To Your Application**
* CV


 We believe in the strength of having a recruitment process that applies to everyone. As part of the selection, we use psychometric tests to ensure an objective, unbiased, and fair selection. The tests are the first step in our selection process. You will receive a link to these tests after we have received your application.
   

  

 We value the personal meeting to understand the value you can bring to PwC and what we can offer you. The interview process usually consists of multiple stages and various types of interviews. When meeting with HR, you will have a competency-based interview where we examine the personality test you completed before the interview. During the interview with the business, you will have the opportunity to meet with the relevant team to discuss the role. We call for interviews continuously, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.

title: Informationssäkerhetsspecialist Stockholm
description:
**Om arbetsplatsen**
 Vi vill vara det självklara valet för dig som vill arbeta med arbetslöshetsförsäkringen och lägger därför kraft på att skapa en god arbetsmiljö och förmånliga anställningsvillkor.
   

  

 Som medarbetare på Unionens a-kassa kan vi bland annat erbjuda dig:
   

  

* marknadsmässig lön
* ett riktigt bra kollektivavtal med bland annat generös avsättning till tjänstepension och minst 33 dagar semester per år
* ett friskvårdsbidrag på 4 500 kronor per år
* arbetstider med flexibilitet under ansvar
* en friskvårdstimme per vecka, hälsoinspiratörer och möjlighet till massage på kontoret
* möjlighet att delvis arbeta hemifrån
* goda utvecklings- och karriärmöjligheter


 Vi är cirka 300 anställda som sitter i fina lokaler centralt i Malmö, på Södermalm i Stockholm och i centrala Örebro. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att främja mångfald och inkludering i vår rekryteringsprocess.
   

  

 Vill du vara en del av Unionens arbetslöshetskassa och vara 100 procent viktig varje dag?
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Som informationssäkerhetspecialist ansvarar du för att planera vårt informationssäkerhetsarbete och samordnar med IT-säkerhetsarbetet på arbetsplatsen. Du stödjer ansvariga i verksamheten för att säkra hanteringen av information och informationstillgångar. Du förebygger och upptäcker säkerhetsrisker samt utvärderar och följer upp resultat och efterlevnad. I arbetet ingår även att informera och utbilda verksamheten för att möjliggöra ett säkert användande av digitala tjänster, samt säkerställa att vi följer lagstiftning och andra krav.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna innebär rent praktiskt att:
   

  

* införa och utveckla ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet, och kontinuerligt rapportera om status till ledningen
* bidra i arbetet med att ta fram risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser samt hantera och vara ett stöd vid informationssäkerhetsincidenter
* ansvara för verksamhetens dokumentation och rutiner inom området samt bidra till närliggande områden
* bidra i arbete med leverantörer, övriga tredjepartsföretag, andra externa parter och samarbetspartners
* omvärldsbevaka inom eget ansvarsområde.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* erfarenhet av informationssäkerhetsarbete och kunskap om gällande standarder och lagstiftningar på området
* erfarenhet av att ha implementerat ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet
* akademisk utbildning eller likvärdig utbildning
* erfarenhet av arbete på en a-kassa eller annan liknande organisation.


 Du är målfokuserad, tänker strategiskt och ser till hela verksamhetens bästa i agerande och beslut. Du har en god förmåga att arbeta självständigt, men är även lyhörd och samarbetar väl med andra. Du har förståelse för människors olika förutsättningar och ett pedagogiskt sätt att förmedla ditt budskap till mottagare. Du har även goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.
   

  

 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Arbetsmarknaden förändras i allt snabbare takt och arbetslöshetskassornas uppdrag har kanske aldrig varit viktigare. Vi på Unionens a-kassa brinner för det här uppdraget.
   

  

 Unionens a-kassa är den näst största arbetslöshetskassan i Sverige med nästan 750 000 medlemmar. Vi fattar beslut i ärenden om medlemskap och arbetslöshetsersättning enligt lagen om arbetslöshetskassor (LAK) och lagen om arbetslöshetsförsäkring (ALF). Arbetslöshetsförsäkringen är en omställningsförsäkring vid arbetslöshet och vårt arbete påverkar många människors vardag.
   

  

 Våra ledord är kvalitet, effektivitet, tillgänglighet och engagemang, och vår vision är att vara det självklara valet!

title: Customer Success Manager (Service Manager)
description:
**Who we’re looking for!**
 We’re excited to announce an opportunity for a Service Manager for our Asset Finance solutions! As a Service Manager, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the success and satisfaction of our clients. This position involves proactive engagement, relationship-building and collaboration with clients to maximize the value they derive from our solutions.
   

  

 As part of our Asset Finance team, you'll help businesses unlock growth by providing innovative financing solutions for essential assets like vehicles and equipment. As a market leader in the Nordics, collaborating with some of the largest car brands, and powering the majority of all Nordic financed cars, you’ll play a key role in creating solutions that make these assets more accessible, enabling clients to achieve ambitious goals and drive lasting success.
   

  

 You’re strongly aligned with our
 **Employee DNA** 
 which celebrates curiosity, collaboration, competence, and customer focus.
   

  

**What does the role look like?**
* Be the contact person for one or more customers and to ensure services are delivered according to agreed quality and profitability
* To be the customers representative inside Banqsoft which means coordination and follow-up on activities internally and to the customer
* Work on client strategies in corporation with Key Account Manager
* Actively contribute to the development of Banqsoft´s delivery towards customers
* Execute client meetings and follow-up and identify actions internally and towards customer
* Support the customer with planning and delivery of IT projects
* Gather customer needs and possibilities as well as communicate these to stakeholders both internally and with the customer
* Ensure effective communication around the customer internally at Banqsoft
* Client negotiations about extensions or changes of Banqsoft´s services


**Succeeding the Banqsoft way – Employee DNA**
**Curiosity:** 
 We embrace the 'Why?’. It’s the spark that ignites learning, innovation, and progress.
   

  

**Collaboration:** 
 Team players with diverse perspectives have more fun building together
   

  

**Competence:** 
 We're hungry for more! Ever ready for new skills and always seeking to learn.
   

  

**Customer Focus:** 
 We're dedicated to enabling our customers' success. We deliver the benefits of technology to make a difference in society, business, and everyday life.
   

  

**Are we a great match?**
 To master the role of Service Manager we believe that you have:
   

  

* A bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Technology, or related field
* Industry experience in IT, banking and/or finance
* 2+ years of working experience in customer success, account management, project management, product management, service management, delivery management or business development
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build great relationships with clients and internal teams
* A service minded attitude, commercially minded and strong project management skills
* You are solution oriented and work well with complex issues and enjoy working with others
* Excellent communication skills in English and Swedish and/or Norwegian, both verbally and written
* Strong alignment with our Employee DNA


**It’s great if you have (but not a must!):**
* Experience in ITIL
* Experience of working with international customers


 If you believe this role aligns with your career aspirations, we would very much like to hear from you!

title: Grafana and Kubernetes Specialist
description:
**About Us:** 




 At Dabster, we excel at connecting top talent with global leaders across industries. We are currently seeking an experienced
 **Grafana and Kubernetes Specialist** 
 to join our client's team in Stockholm, Sweden. Our mission is to be the premier recruitment partner, enabling outstanding professionals to thrive in cutting-edge roles across the globe.
 



  
 



**Who Will You Work With:** 




 Our client is a prominent player in the IT infrastructure domain, focusing on implementing robust, scalable, and secure systems. You will be part of the Sapphire team, which is responsible for managing critical infrastructure solutions.
 



  
 



**About the Role:** 




 We are looking for a
 **Grafana and Kubernetes Specialist** 
 to contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of cutting-edge IT infrastructure systems. This is a
 **6-month B2B contract** 
 with the possibility of extension. The position is based in Stockholm, Sweden, and requires immediate availability or the ability to start by January 2025.
 



 As part of the Sapphire team, you will leverage your expertise in Grafana and Kubernetes to monitor, troubleshoot, and optimize complex infrastructure environments. You will collaborate with DevOps and SRE teams to ensure efficient operations and provide actionable insights through data visualization.
 



  
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 




**Grafana Administration:** 



* Design, implement, and maintain Grafana dashboards for infrastructure and application performance monitoring.
* Optimize Grafana’s LGTM stack performance and troubleshoot data visualization issues.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define key metrics and create actionable dashboards.



**EKS Cluster Management:** 



* Manage Kubernetes clusters on AWS using EKS.
* Implement and oversee networking, storage, and security components for Kubernetes.



**Monitoring and Alerting:** 



* Develop and maintain monitoring systems using Grafana, Prometheus, and related tools.
* Set up alerting mechanisms for proactive issue resolution.
* Analyze logs and metrics to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks.



**Automation and Scripting:** 



* Write and maintain automation scripts using Python or other Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform (Pulumi is a plus).
* Automate routine tasks to improve operational efficiency.



**Collaboration and Support:** 



* Work closely with DevOps, SRE, and development teams to implement best practices in monitoring and operations.
* Participate in on-call rotation to support EKS clusters and monitoring infrastructure.



  
 



**Preferred Skills:** 



* 8–10+ years of experience in IT infrastructure.
* Proficiency in Grafana, including building complex dashboards.
* Expertise in Kubernetes management, especially AWS EKS.
* Experience with Python scripting and IaC tools like Terraform.
* Familiarity with Prometheus, Loki, and Elasticsearch.
* Strong understanding of networking, security, and storage in Kubernetes.
* Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.



  
 



**What We Offer:** 



* **Impactful Work:** 
 Collaborate with a leading organization on state-of-the-art IT infrastructure solutions.
* **Location:** 
 Onsite role in Stockholm, Sweden.
* **Contract Type:** 
 6-month B2B contract with potential for extension.
* **Immediate Start:** 
 Interviews can be scheduled promptly, with a start date by January 2025 at the latest.



  
 



**Interview Process:** 




 Candidates can expect one or two rounds of technical discussions, followed by a business-focused round.
 



  
 



**How To Apply** 




 If you're an experienced Electrical Engineer with a passion for problem-solving and analysis, we'd love to hear from you.
 



  





 Submit your resume detailing your relevant experience via LinkedIn or send it to 
 **pavankumar@dabster.net**

title: Operative Product Owner (OPO)
description:
Join our Team
   

  

**About this opportunity:**
 Join Hardware Engineering, a leading Radio Network R&D unit, to develop high-quality Radio products. Based in Kista, Stockholm, and collaborating globally, we offer opportunities to work with cutting-edge telecommunication technology in a dynamic environment. Our cross-functional teams focus on the auxiliary control system (XCS) for radio products, amid high demand for 5G innovation.
   

  

 We are seeking an Operative Product Owner (OPO) for XCS with a focus on Security. You'll ensure the team's backlog is prioritized, collaborating globally with various teams. As an OPO, you'll articulate value, refine the backlog into actionable stories, and drive solutions across all aspects of the role.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Acting as the interface for backlog item prioritization
* Managing and distributing requirement requests within XCS globally
* Maintaining and prioritizing a long-term Requirement Area backlog
* Visualizing XCS future plans and capabilities
* Contributing to XCS strategic plans
* Driving various projects/SPs


**The skills you bring:**
* Bachelor's or master's in computer science, Electrical/Electronic Engineering, Wireless Communication, or equivalent
* 5+ years of proven product development experience, with systemization, design, and verification knowledge
* Domain experience in Security, Linux, and software close to hardware
* Strong communication and leadership aligned with Ericsson's core values
* Understanding of Lean and Agile methodologies
* Interest in people and strong presentation skills
* Ability to work across organizational boundaries and with competent colleagues
* Flexibility and willingness to tackle various tasks
* Business focus with accountability for results
* Knowledge in product development and Product Lifecycle Management


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Business Development Executive
description:
**Your role**
**What You'll Be Doing**
 Corpay is currently looking to hire a Business Development Executive within our Cross-Border line of business in Sweden. This group partners with a range of companies across various industries to help solve the unique challenges of processing cross-border payments. Our subject matter experts enable our partners to create, integrate, service and scale a world-class currency and payments offering.
   

  

 This is a fantastic opportunity for a highly driven sales professional to join our successful sales team at our office in Stockholm. We are seeking hungry, sales-focused professionals with a passion in FX. You will be key in growing Corpay’s commercial presence and enhancing our portfolio by bringing in new business partners and revenues by successfully prospecting, selling and on-boarding new clients.
   

  

 FX is a fast-paced industry where you will be speaking to business owners and C-level executives to learn and fully understand their business and international payments needs, and ultimately, determine how our solutions can help them more efficiently and cost-effectively.
   

  

**How We Work**
 As a Business Development Executive, you will be expected to work in a hybrid (3-4 office days) environment in Stockholm, Sweden. Corpay will set you up for success by providing:
   

  

* Assigned workspace in our Stockholm office
* Company-issued equipment + remote access
* Formal, hands-on training


**Role Responsibilities**
* Identifying business opportunities by sourcing prospects and evaluating their FX needs
* Harvesting sales channels within the sales region as per business strategy and target markets, which includes, but is not limited to: Business Networking, Exhibitions, Specific sponsorship events, Telephone solicitation etc.
* Selling Corpay solutions using a consultative approach and truly understanding client needs and presenting solutions based upon their needs, while fully explaining our value proposition and online product portfolio
* Managing client on boarding processes while maintaining an exemplary customer experience


**Qualifications & Skills**
* An interest in foreign exchange, banking and finance
* Proven Sales and analytical skills for successful business generation
* Previous outbound business-to-business phone marketing or sales experience would be desirable
* Ability to navigate corporate structures to identify decision makers and the ability to build rapports
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, plus strong interpersonal skills
* Self-motivated and focused, combined with effective organisational and time management skills
* Professional demeanour to prospective and current clients coupled with strong listening skills
* The ability to work as a team player towards a specific sales goal
* Attention to detail, particularly with respect to client information and payment data
* Strong mathematical skills


**About Corpay**
 Corpay is a global technology organisation that is leading the future of commercial payments with a culture of innovation that drives us to constantly create new and better ways to pay. Our specialized payment solutions help businesses control, simplify, and secure payment for fuel, general payables, toll and lodging expenses. Millions of people in over 80 countries around the world use our solutions for their payments.
   

  

 All offers of employment made by Corpay (and its subsidiary companies) are subject to the successful completion of satisfactory pre-employment vetting by an independent supplier (Experian). This is in accordance with Corpay's Resourcing Policy and include employment referencing, identity, adverse financial, criminal and sanctions list checks. We do this to meet our legal and regulatory requirements.
   

  

 Corpay is dedicated to encouraging a supportive and inclusive culture among our employees. It is within our best interest to promote diversity and eliminate discrimination in the workplace. We seek to ensure that all employees and job applicants are given equal opportunities.
   

  

**Notice to Agency and Search Firm Representatives:** 
 Corpay
 **will not** 
 accept unsolicited CV's from agencies and/or search firms for this job posting. Resumes submitted to any Corpay employee by a third party agency and/or search firm without a valid written & signed search agreement, will become the sole property of Corpay. No fee will be paid if a candidate is hired for this position as a result of an unsolicited agency or search firm referral. Thank you.

title: Talent Acquisition Manager - Solna
company_industry: Manufacturing, Dairy Product Manufacturing, and Food and Beverage Manufacturing
description:
Location
   

  

 Solna, SE
   

  

 Are you an ambitious, proactive and self-driven individual with broad experience within recruiting and employer branding? Are you experienced in leading a fast paced team? If yes, this is a great opportunity to grow your career within Talent Acquisition and be part of the journey to create the future of dairy. We invite you to join Arla’s Talent Acquisition team in Stockholm as an operational Talent Acquisition
   

  

 Manager with responsibility for leading our TA team, make sure our processes and ways of working is top notch, driving your own recruitments and assessments, being the strategic TA head owner of Arla
   

  

 Sweden and represent us in our global TA settings.
   

  

 The position is based at our HQ in Solna, Stockholm and you will report to our Director HR operations.
   

  

**How You Will Make An Impact**
 Talent Acquisition in Arla is responsible for recruitment, sourcing, selection, assessment and graduate programmes. Employer branding is also part of our responsibility. We are two TA Consultants and an
   

  

 Employer Branding specialist. As a Talent Acquisition Manager you will partner closely with colleagues in TA, with HRBP’s and with senior business stakeholders in order to find and attract the best talents to Arla.
   

  

 For this position, the focus will be on driving and developing the TA team, manage your own full
   

  

 recruitment processes, improving and developing both existing processes and implement new ways of working. You will also be involved in bort local and global HR projects.
   

  

 Applying your skills, you provide our managers with high-quality expert advice and ensure that the entire recruitment process is handled professionally, swiftly and successfully. You will handle everything from analysing the job and candidate profile to choosing media channels for advertising, conducting
   

  

 interviews and tests and finally selecting the right candidate for the job in close cooperation with the
   

  

 hiring manager. Last but not least, you will secure close communication with your internal and external stakeholders and have a close collaboration with talented and enthusiastic colleagues placed in countries such as Denmark, UK, Germany and Poland.
   

  

**What Will Make You Successful**
* You have a university degree within HR, Psychology or Business combined with experience as a sourcer / headhunter/recruiter in a search firm/recruiting firm or similar
* Experience of inhouse recruitment is a merit
* Previous teamlead/people manager experience is required
* Experience of test tools and conducting test feedback sessions is required
* Certification in Hogans assessment and/or Predictive index is a huge advantage
* You must hold a high level of proficiency in written and spoken Swedish and English


 You are a gifted, dedicated and inspiring manager who delivers high quality within deadline.
   

  

 Your empathy and strong business understanding enables you to establish relationships at all levels and ensure an optimal recruitment process and candidate experience. You are persistent and have a strong drive and a personal impact. You can work both independently as well as in a team and experienced with driving and managing your own projects.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 We welcome you to our amazing Arla culture. We offer competitive salary and benefits, a great and high performing team, a really nice office with breakfast served twice a week. At Arla Foods we want to create the conditions for our colleagues to have a sustainable work life by offering flexibility and the opportunity to work in the office and remotely; based on the needs of the business and the employees. We call it the “Power of the Mix”.
   

  

 We are farmer owned and our mission is to secure the highest milk price for our farmers and to make sure we deliver food to our society. We’re filling the shelfs in the stores.
   

  

 Arla Foods has collective agreements, and we always ensure to offer good and competitive working conditions. In addition to that, safety and working environment are our top priorities, which is why we, among other things, conduct random drug and alcohol tests.
   

  

**Would you like to join us?**
 We will start the screening process in the second week in January and we will, after that, process
   

  

 applications on a continuous basis and close the recruitment once the right candidate is found. Please apply no later than 15th of January. For additional information, please contact Talent Acquisition
   

  

 Manager, Eva Bexelius on evbex@arlafoods.com
   

  

 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be
   

  

 accepted or considered.
   

  

 We use tests as a part of our initial screening in our recruitment process.
   

  

**We have a purpose for Good**
 At Arla, we strive to unlock the highest potential in each other while working together to create a sustainable future of dairy. We call it Stronger People Stronger Planet and it is deeply anchored in our organisation and founded on our commitment to respecting human rights, increasing access to healthy dairy nutrition, inspiring good food habits, and improving the environment for future generations. In order to succeed we need to hire people with a sustainable mindset. Could this be you?
   

  

***BEWARE! RECRUITMENT FRAUD***
*It has come to our attention that there are a number of fraudulent emails and fake recruitment campaigns on the internet from people purporting to work for Arla Foods. Learn more via this* 
*link* 
*.*
 #POB
