title: Practice Leader Security
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward – always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
**As part of our ongoing transformation, Kyndryl is looking for it** 
**a Cyber security practice leader.**
 In this role you will be a senior member of the Country leadership team responsible for developing, accelerating and leading Security , Cyber resiliency and Network practices. Kyndryl has more than 7,500 Cyber resiliency experts across consult and managed services globally with a GTM model led by Consulting in the disciplines of Security assurance and risk management services , Zero trust services , SOC modernisation consulting and Resiliency services
   

  

 You will be responsible for achieving revenue and profit growth across all aspects of the practice, growing our client base and driving year on year revenue , profit and signings by building a customer-centric mindset with prior experience of ‘baking and building’: creating leading go to market strategies, building and developing a consult led organization. You will be a business leader who dares to have
 *that* 
 business conversation, accountable for building market presence, strategy, and a compelling portfolio of services. Business with a strong track record of growth , and strong client loyalty
   

  

 The role is a strong externally facing role that requires leading from the front with customers and teams in the field. You will work closely with not only our Country Leadership, but the account teams, delivery teams, and cross practice teams. Responsible for achieving the practice's Country business and financial goals, your activities include long-term strategic planning; leading go to market and growth. Being the external thought leader for the practice with our Customers, media, press and analysts, you will execute the policies of the practice, allocate its resources and make decisions regarding diversification to accomplish the organization's vision.
   

  

 As a senior Leader you will bring a strong network of C-suite customers with you and continue to foster strong relationships with all segments of the market and bringing industry perspectives and insights into desired solution-oriented customer outcomes. As the established leader in Cyber resiliency and Network services, Kyndryl gives you the opportunity to grow your existing knowledge and account management capabilities.
   

  

 As Practice General Management, you will play a critical role in driving the success and sustainability of the practice at Kyndryl. You will be accountable for achieving both operational and financial goals, ensuring that the practice meets and exceeds its objectives. Your leadership will be essential in controlling, directing, and actively participating in the activities of the practice, guiding a team of managers and supervisors to perform at their highest potential.
   

  

 You will engage in long-term strategic planning, helping to define the future direction of the practice and establishing key initiatives that will drive growth and success. This role involves setting and determining policies that will shape the practice’s operations and ensuring that resources are effectively allocated to maximize efficiency and impact. You will also be responsible for making critical decisions regarding growth, diversification, and other strategic priorities that align with the organization’s overall vision.
   

  

 Additionally, you will cultivate a culture of accountability, collaboration, and innovation within the practice. Your focus will be on balancing the practice’s short-term needs with its long-term ambitions, fostering an environment where teams can thrive and deliver high-quality outcomes. Your ability to lead through complexity, adapt to evolving market dynamics, and inspire a shared commitment to success will be essential in ensuring the practice remains competitive and forward-looking in a rapidly changing landscape.
   

  

 Your Future at Kyndryl
   

  

 Every position at Kyndryl offers a way forward to grow your career. We have opportunities that you won’t find anywhere else, including hands-on experience, learning opportunities, and certification programs. Whether you want to broaden your knowledge base or narrow your scope and specialize in a specific sector, you can find your opportunity here.
   

  

**Who You Are**
**Prior experience in the following are pre-requisites:**
* You will demonstrate a strong track record of achieving revenue and profit growth and of leading an organisation that has achieved significant results and reputation in Nordics
* Demonstrate a strong track record and reputation of leading cyber -resiliency consulting engagements at ‘C’ suite level across different market segments and verticals
* Acting as a thought leader in the Market, with experience selling or consulting in more than one vertical (Financial Services , Industrial , healthcare , retail , transport , Public)
* Be able to demonstrate a client centric mindset and experience across the Cyber resiliency and Networking domains


**Day to day responsibilities include :**
* Working proactively with every client and client facing team to help them:
* Develop the strategic roadmap cyber resiliency and security on their each account.
* Initiate and conduct opportunity identification workshops and execute the plan to grow revenue share in that client relationship
* Help win and grow new customers (leveraging your ‘C-Suite’ network and Kyndryl’s strong capability and reputation .
* Expand and lead a team of experts (direct and virtual, tech and sales) to
* Drive expertise for our clients in various Cyber security , resiliency and network , methodologies and frameworks
* Execute at scale consult and project transformations for our clients
* Achieve new Logo customer signings to Kyndryl .
* Own Kyndryl NORDICS partner relationships for the major technology partners
* Technology partners like Cisco, Elastic , Splunk , Dell , Veritas , Rubrik etc.
* Services partners that can be leveraged for niche skills
* Hyperscalers (AWS, Microsoft, and Google)


 Who You Are
   

  

 You work well within a team environment and are comfortable adapting your responsibilities as the project needs evolve. However, equally as important – you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer-focused – someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you’re open and borderless – naturally inclusive in how you work with others.
   

  

**Required Skills And Experience**
* Extensive experience in a strategic technology function translating business needs, creating strategic options, and driving the design and execution of large-scale transformations
* Ability to create effective relationships and to influence and collaborate at all organizational levels, internally and externally
* Ability to partner across business and shared services to prioritize the immediate needs today and in the future for a competitive business that reflects the new operating model
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams


**Preferred Skills And Experience**
* Expertise in Data and AI technologies
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it’s how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we’re not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you – and everyone next to you – the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That’s the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter – wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‘How Did You Hear About Us’ during the application process, select ‘Employee Referral’ and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: Integrationsutvecklare
description:
**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2025-01-17
 



  





  





**Svenska kraftnät** 
 är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Som Integrationsutvecklare erbjuds du ett av Sveriges viktigaste IT-jobb, i vilket du varje dag kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning.
 **Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige.** 




  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Som Integrationsutvecklare kommer du tillsammans med dina kollegor ansvara för och vara med att driva utvecklingen av nästa generations integrationsplattform. Plattformen är samhällskritisk och hanterar integrationer mellan Svenska kraftnäts IT-system och externa aktörer.
 



 Du får arbeta i en modern miljö och göra ett verkligt avtryck i den tekniska förflyttningen mot framtiden. Din insats säkrar Sveriges elförsörjning.
 



  





 Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:
 


* Utveckla och designa integrationsflöden mellan interna och externa system med API:er och meddelandetjänster
* Hantera, transformera och konvertera olika meddelandeformat exempelvis XML, JSON och liknande
* Dokumentera tekniska design- och systemlösningar
* Deltagande i projekt- och förvaltningsarbete samt stötta projektdeltagare och andra intressenter med kunskap om bästa metod inom området



  





 Du blir en del av enheten Integration (med ett Integrationskompetenscenter) bestående av 26 engagerade, erfarna och hjälpsamma kollegor.
 



  





**Om dig** 




 Vi söker dig som arbetar målmedvetet för att nå resultat, alltid med fokus på att leverera hög kvalitet och ett gott resultat. Du är samarbetsorienterad och har ett prestigelöst arbetssätt där du anpassar dig för att hitta lösningar som gynnar hela teamet. Din starka analytiska förmåga hjälper dig att se helheten och samband i komplex information. Du har förmågan till att hålla ett övergripande perspektiv och ser hur systemlandskapet utgör en del av en större helhet. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





**Skallkrav** 




 Vidare ser vi att du har utbildning från högskola eller universitet inom datasystemvetenskap, systemutveckling eller liknande, alternativt motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt.
 



  





 Du har även:
 


* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av integrationsutveckling på en integrationsplattform som t.ex. Oracle SOA, Mulesoft eller Biztalk
* Erfarenhet av applikationsutveckling som bygger på mikrotjänstarkitektur och container-teknik, t.ex. Docker/Kubernetes
* Erfarenhet av XML, XSD och XSLT för XML-transformation
* Erfarenhet av Java-utveckling
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och i skrift



  





**Meriterande** 




 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
 


* Java-ramverket Apache Camel.
* Ramverken Spring/Spring Boot
* Meddelandeutbyten baserat på exempelvis JMS, AMQP, Kafka, SFTP, SOAP och REST. Testramverk t.ex. JUnit eller Citrus.
* Bygg- och release-pipelines i CI/CD-plattformar som t.ex. Azure DevOps server eller GitLab.
* Helm och ArgoCD för paketering och distribution av applikationer.



  





**Bra att veta** 



* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 % #LI-hybrid
* Sista ansökningsdag är
 **2025-01-17** 
 . Vi tar inte emot personligt brev i samband med din ansökan.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid



  





 Svenska kraftnät har förmånliga semestervillkor, flexibla arbetstider och en mötespolicy som ger goda möjligheter att balansera arbete och privatliv. Läs mer här:
 **Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät** 




  





 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Svenska kraftnät med IDG Recruitment. För frågor kring tjänsten och rekryteringsprocessen, välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsult Alexandra Tihinen, telefon 070-447 92 24,
 **alexandra.tihinen@foundryco.com** 
 .
 



  





 Rekryterande chef är Magnus Kjellme. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim, ST, tel. 010-475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post:
 **fornamn.efternamn@svk.se** 
 .
 



  





**Övrig information** 




 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
 



  





**För mer information om säkerhetsprövning** 
 Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss:
 **Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät**

title: Senior Sales Executive
description:
**⚡️ What We Do**
 Swiftly gaining ground as Sweden’s industry leader in battery storage and expanding rapidly in selected European markets, Flower is on a mission to enable the energy system of tomorrow.
   

  

 With an industry-leading AI-powered platform at its core, our service includes stabilizing the energy system by enhancing predictability and flexibility for both energy producers and consumers. By combining pioneering technology with a portfolio of flexible energy assets, we break new ground towards a fossil-free energy system, allowing clean energy to power society.
   

  

**🌟Who We Are**
 Tech company at heart – purpose in our DNA. Flower consists of a diverse group of innovative individuals with a strong desire to improve the state of the world.
   

  

 At Flower, we believe trust, collaboration and diversity are essential to not only create an inclusive work environment, but also drive career growth. By embracing varying perspectives, we allow creativity and progress to flourish.
   

  

 To accelerate towards our goal of becoming the pioneering force powering the energy system of tomorrow, we are now looking for a passionate and skilled
 ****Senior Sales Executive****
 to join the team.
   

  

**👩‍💻 About The Role**
 Are you passionate about driving commercial success in the energy sector? Flower is seeking a dynamic Senior Sales Executive to join our team. In this role, you will play a key part in expanding our business by identifying new opportunities, building meaningful relationships, and closing impactful deals. You’ll work closely with our skilled Sales Engineers, who bring technical expertise to support your efforts, and our Partner Success Managers, who strengthen and expand our relationships with existing partners.
   

  

 This is a high-impact, individual contributor role where your commercial skills and sales experience will be critical to our growth.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Identify and attract new customers through proactive prospecting and networking.
* Lead and conduct sales meetings, present tailored solutions, and close deals that align with business objectives.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, and industry partners.
* Actively participate in industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to represent Flower and expand our reach.
* Collaborate closely with Sales Engineers to provide clients with the best technical and commercial solutions.
* Work in alignment with Partner Success Managers to leverage existing partnerships and identify upselling opportunities.


**Who You Are**
* Proven track record of closing deals and demonstrated ability to meet or exceed sales targets, with +7 years experience of B2B complex sales environments, ideally within the energy sector.
* Familiarity with market trends, innovation, key players, and dynamics in the energy sector or a related field.
* Adept at building and maintaining trust-based relationships with clients, partners, and stakeholders.
* Skilled in public speaking and experienced in representing organisations at industry events, conferences, and other speaking engagements.
* Deep understanding of business development principles, financial concepts, and the ability to align sales efforts with overall business objectives.
* Independent, proactive, and structured, with the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Expertise in negotiating high-value contracts and managing the full sales cycle.
* Digital-savvy sales professional with strong expertise in leveraging social selling strategies, particularly on LinkedIn, and effectively utilizing various digital tools to drive engagement, build relationships and achieve sales goals.
* Experience using CRM platforms (e.g., Upsales) and other sales tools to manage pipelines and track performance.
* Degree in Business or Engineering, or another relevant field.
* Fluency in Swedish and English is required. Proficiency in additional languages in German, French, or Dutch is considered a valuable asset.


**📍 Location**
 Our beautiful office is located in the heart of Södermalm just a short walk from Slussen subway station. We encourage in-office collaboration but support a hybrid work model.
   

  

**✉️ Apply**
 To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and what you think you could bring to our team. Throughout the recruitment process you will meet with the
 ****People & Culture Partner, VP of Commercial, Senior Sales Executive and our CEO John.****
 Our corporate language is English, as we have over 20 nationalities in the office. We therefore appreciate it if you could submit your CV in English.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

*We kindly but firmly decline any engagement in recruitment assistance for our hiring processes. This includes partnership offers or the sale of recruitment tools.*

title: DSP Partnerships KAM - Tiktok & Youtube Music
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture.** 
**Come join us—and let the world feel your work.**
**As a DSP Key Account Manager with focus on Tiktok and Youtube Music, you will play a crucial role in the Music department, reporting into the Head of Commercial Music Partnerships. This is a full-time position located at our headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden.**
**Job Summary:**
 As Key Account Manager, DSP Partnerships, you will be responsible for meeting target KPIs on Tiktok, Youtube Music (including our Youtube music channels) and other accounts assigned to you, in order to generate sales and growth for our catalog. The accounts represent our most valued business partners within the segment, and you will manage both strategy and relationships with the DSPs and make sure we act with operational excellence. You will pitch and promote our catalog in line with department and overall company strategy, with the aim of ensuring maximum impact of our releases on the platforms.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Manage and nurture relationships with our Tiktok, Youtube Music and other partners, ensuring that our catalog receives the attention it deserves by executing on playlisting and other programming opportunities. You will also manage the work with Epidemic Sound’s own YouTube Music channels
* Through both direct interactions and the utilization of platform tools, you'll work with our releases effectively, maximizing revenue and visibility
* Beyond managing existing partnerships, you'll actively seek out and cultivate new relationships with music partners globally. This expansion will be instrumental in increasing our reach and driving growth
* Make sure to timely report performance metrics for the accounts assigned
* Be a strong user of data and take actions based on these insights to improve streams, visibility, and revenue of the catalog on DSPs
* Maintain strong knowledge of the streaming landscape and make sure to communicate information internally
* Contribute to team OKRs to ensure initiatives, processes, and programs are achieved
* Stay up to date with trends and best practices within the field
* Work as an internal liaison between relevant stakeholders in order to ensure we deliver according to deal terms and meet set goals
* Support improvement of partnership productivity focused on implementation and reporting standardization


**Requirements:**
* In-depth knowledge of the music industry
* 5+ years industry experience, and 2+ years working in a similar position with Tiktok/Bytedance and/or Youtube
* Proven track record of growing revenues through key account management
* In-depth knowledge of a broad range of musical genres
* In-depth knowledge of the leading digital music platforms, with focus on Tiktok and Youtube
* Solid understanding of sales strategy and how it can be used to strengthen platform performance
* Proven track record of working with more complex analytical tasks to maximize results


**Preferred Qualifications/ Bonus Skills:**
* Detailed oriented - Ensures information is complete and accurate
* Strong organizing, administration and structured skills
* High initiative skills - Identifies opportunities and issues, and proactively acts and follows through on work activities to capitalize or resolve them
* Highly skilled in prioritizing - Plans and organizes work activities; manages several tasks at once


**Equal Opportunity Employer:**
 We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.
   

  

**Application**
 Do you want to be a part of our fantastic team? Please apply, in English, by clicking the link below.
   

  

**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us—and let the world feel your work.**

title: Senior Enterprise Sales Executive - Apptio
description:
**Introduction**
 Apptio IBM is the leading technology spend and value management company for financial and operational decisions across Information Technology (IT), multi-cloud FinOps, and product development. Apptio's mission is to deliver business value with every technology investment.
   

  

 Powered by Apptio’s cloud platform and AI/ML data engine, Apptio’s SaaS applications translate technology spend into clear business outcomes and financial ROI.
   

  

**Apptio Applications Deliver Six Key Capabilities**
* cost transparency
* actionable insights
* planning and forecasting
* usage and consumption
* value management
* showback/chargeback


 As a trusted leader in FinOps and Technology Business Management (TBM) with thousands of customers worldwide, Apptio empowers leaders to cut costs and redirect investments to digital innovation. We have been named as the leader in the Gartner Magic quadrant for Cloudability in October 2024. Our acquisition by IBM is reinforcing our spot of market leader and will reserve some future product evolvements that will make us in a even stonger position in the market.
   

  

**Your Role and Responsibilities**
 You are an energetic and self-motivated professional with a proven track record of delivering exceptional customer value in your region. You consistently exceed targets, develop new markets, and collaborate effectively within your ecosystem to achieve company goals. You communicate fluently with CIOs, CFOs, COOs, and key stakeholders, inspiring and challenging them while initiating meaningful conversations across all organizational levels. You possess a deep understanding of the interplay between Finance, IT, and business operations, with a solid grasp of FinOps, TBM, and Scaled Agile methodologies. Your "can-do" mentality drives you to work with an entrepreneurial spirit, upholding high quality and ethical standards. You are well-known among multiple CxOs in your territory, and their positive impressions of you pave the way for new business opportunities and collaborations.
   

  

**Our Expectations Of You**
* You excel in strategic selling by cultivating strong relationships with CxO- level executives across complex organizations.
* You successfully open doors at large accounts, build a robust pipeline, manage intricate sales processes, accurately forecast, and close deals with both new and existing customers.
* You are skilled at fostering relationships that expand the customer install base.
* You effectively communicate the Apptio value proposition to senior business leaders, such as CIOs and CFOs, leveraging your deep understanding of IT operations and management.
* You can quickly grasp and articulate key financial management concepts central to the Apptio solution.
* You thrive in an independent, unstructured environment, meeting multiple sales objectives simultaneously.
* You challenge customers to rethink their current business operations and propose solutions that align with their growth strategies through technology innovation.
* You collaborate with various teams within the organization to ensure the success of your sales initiatives, taking the lead in driving results.
* You work closely with marketing and GSI partner organizations to develop strategic plans aimed at driving revenue growth.
* Frequent travel is required to engage with prospects and customers.


**Required Technical and Professional Expertise**
* 10+ years of direct selling to larger enterprises in your territory
* Significant C-level network in your territory
* Entrepreneurial mentality with high energy and drive
* Financial, IT, Business background, incl. knowing the mechanics of SaaS
* Attitude of “can do” and motivator for the rest of the sales team
* Proven ability to independently develop, manage and close new client relationships at CxO level (CIO/IT, CFO/IT finance) in Major, complex accounts
* Experience building relationships with Economic Buyers and Executive Sponsors
* Track record of overachievement with experience hitting quota of $1M+ of ARR per year
* Mastered a solution-based approach to selling with experience managing complex sales processes
* Proactive, independent thinker with high energy/positive attitude
* Excellent verbal and written communication, presentation, and relationship management skills
* Ability to thrive in fast-paced environment
* Prior experience in a start-up environment


**Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise**
* Highly successful enterprise technology sales experience, with a demonstrated track record of consistent over-achievement against assigned quota and a resulting high level of income attainment.
* Past experience should be with market leading companies that dominated their segment.
* Knowledge and experience in managing a highly complex technology sales process is essential.
* Experience in selling SaaS solutions, business/financial applications, or BI solutions is a plus.
* Candidates should have an ability to over time develop a strong executive presence – intelligent, polished, and articulate.


**About Business Unit**
 IBM has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. The company’s Global Markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages IBM’s global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients’ growth and innovation. By complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, IBM builds deep and broad-based client relationships. This local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. Additionally, the Global Markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that IBM and partners supply. IBM is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces.
   

  

**Your Life @ IBM**
 In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
   

  

 Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.
   

  

 Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.
   

  

 Are you ready to be an IBMer?
   

  

**About IBM**
 IBM's greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.
   

  

 Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.
   

  

 At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.
   

  

**Location Statement**
 IBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.
   

  

**Being You @ IBM**
 IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title: HR-konsult till förskoleförvaltningen
description:
Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.
   

  

 Förskoleförvaltningen är en liten fackförvaltning med ett stort och viktigt uppdrag. Hos oss får du vara med och bidra till att alla Stockholms förskolor håller en god kvalitet, såväl kommunala som enskilt drivna. Tillsammans med förskoleverksamheterna i staden sätter vi fokus på att våra yngsta stockholmare ska möta en trygg och likvärdig miljö i förskolan.
   

  

 På förskoleförvaltningen jobbar kunniga och engagerade kollegor inom en mängd expertområden såsom tillsyn och tillståndsprövning samt utveckling inom förskolans alla sakområden.
   

  

 Organisationen är under uppbyggnad och det finns en stor möjlighet för dig att vara delaktig och påverka. Förvaltningens kontor ligger på Kaplansbacken på Kungsholmen.
   

  

 Avdelningen för ledningsstöd och IT fortsätter att expandera och nu söker vi en erfaren HR-konsult till en bred och varierad tjänst.
   

  

**Välkommen till oss**
 Avdelningen för ledningsstöd och IT ansvarar för funktionerna HR, kommunikation, nämndkansli, IT, registratur, verksamhetsuppföljning, informationssäkerhet, beredskapsfrågor och administration.
   

  

 Avdelningen och HR-funktionen expanderar och är under uppbyggnad. Vi söker nu en erfaren HR-konsult som tillsammans med ytterligare en HR-konsult och en HR-administratör vill vara med och bidra i uppbyggnaden av HR-funktionen samt långsiktigt vill utveckla HR-arbetet på förvaltningen. Du rapporterar till avdelningschef för ledningsstöd och IT.
   

  

 På förskoleförvaltningen finns ytterligare tre avdelningar;
   

  

* Myndighetsavdelningen
* Avdelningen för ekonomi och styrning
* Avdelningen för ledningsstöd och IT


 På förskoleförvaltningen samarbetar vi mellan avdelningarna för att vårt arbete ska ge bästa möjliga service och utveckling till alla förskolor i Stockholm.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 En arbetsplats där du får möjlighet att vara med och bygga upp och utveckla HR-funktionen i en liten fackförvaltning som växer och där organisationen förändras. Du ingår i en avdelning med 10 kollegor i olika funktioner där alla bidrar med sin kunskap och erfarenhet. Vi erbjuder en kvalificerad och omväxlande roll där du arbetar brett inom hela HR-området. Det finns goda nätverksmöjligheter för HR inom Stockholms stad.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Du har i uppdrag att tillsammans med ytterligare en HR-konsult driva förvaltningens HR-arbete samt vara ett konsultativt stöd till chefer inom samtliga personalprocesser t ex inom det systematiska arbetsmiljöarbetet, arbetsrätt, verksamhetsförändringar, medarbetarskap- och ledarskapsutveckling, lönebildning, facklig samverkan och förhandlingar. Du stödjer förvaltningens chefer i deras verksamhets-, personal-, och arbetsgivaransvar. HR har en nyckelroll och hos oss arbetar du både operativt och strategiskt med verksamhetsnära personalfrågor, viss administration ingår då vi är en liten förvaltning. Arbetet är omväxlande, utåtriktat och med goda möjligheter till delaktighet i utvecklingen.
   

  

**Din kompetens och erfarenhet**
 För denna tjänst krävs att du har:
   

  

* en akademisk högskoleexamen från personalvetarprogrammet eller annan akademisk examen som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig
* gedigen och aktuell erfarenhet av att ha arbetat i en bred och kvalificerad HR-roll där du gett konsultativt stöd till chefer
* utbildning, goda kunskaper och erfarenhet inom arbetsrätt
* erfarenhet av att arbeta med verksamhetsförändring
* erfarenhet av att driva och utveckla systematiskt arbetsmiljöarbete
* god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift
* goda IT-kunskaper och vana att arbeta i olika personalsystem


 Meriterande för tjänsten är om du har arbetat i liknande roll inom kommunal verksamhet.
   

  

 Vi förväntar oss att du självständigt kan driva och ta ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter. Du tar initiativ till arbetssätt/metoder som är genomförbara och gagnar vårt uppdrag och måluppfyllelse. Du kommunicerar på ett tydligt och pedagogiskt sätt, förstår din roll, och ser till hela verksamhetens bästa i agerande och beslut. Du är lugn och behåller ett realistiskt perspektiv i olika situationer. Du har en god förmåga att i ditt uppdrag bygga, utveckla och bibehålla ett gott samarbete och professionella relationer med kollegor, verksamhetens chefer, fackliga representanter och andra aktörer.
   

  

 Vid rekryteringen lägger vi stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet, motivation och engagemang för tjänsten.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Vi rekryterar utan det personliga brevet i denna rekrytering för att stärka fokus på de kompetenser och erfarenheter som efterfrågas för denna roll. Vid bedömningen av din ansökan kommer vi endast att utgå ifrån ditt CV och ett antal frågor du får besvara i samband med att du söker tjänsten.
   

  

 I denna rekryteringsprocess kan arbetspsykologiska tester komma att användas.
   

  

 Vi ser mångfald som berikande och välkomnar alla sökande.
   

  

 Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/6002 | Kontakt: Åsa Rönndahl, avdelningschef 08-50800911, Anna Nordahl, rekryteringskonsult 08-50811734, | Facklig företrädare: Tibor Muhi, Saco tibor.muhi@edu.stockholm.se, | Publicerat: 2024-12-26 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-01-09

title: IT-support inom samhällsutveckling
description:
*Har du sen tidigare erfarenhet av IT och har ambitioner att utvecklas vidare?* 
 Sök till oss och bli en del av ett dedikerat team!
   

  

**Rollen**
 Här kommer du ge förstärkning till ett härligt team med stark gemenskap och fokus på struktur. Vår kund verkar inom tjänsterna samhällsbyggnad och teknik, och har sina lokaler i centrala Stockholm. Deras vision är vara ledande inom hållbar samhällsutveckling genom att skapa innovativa lösningar för framtida städer.
   

  

 I arbetsuppgifterna ingår att ta emot inkommande ärenden via mejl, telefon, ärendehanteringssystem, samt ge support på plats hos användarna på kontoret. Som en del av dina ansvarsområden kommer du också att supportera verksamhetsapplikationer för att säkerställa en smidig driftsmiljö.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig om har minst ett års erfarenhet av arbete inom IT-Support.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 När du börjar hos oss som konsult på Wise IT blir du en del av vår gemenskap. Du får kollegor runt om i Sverige på alla regionala Wise IT kontor och även med våra andra konsulter som sitter ute på uppdrag hos våra kunder.
   

  

 Du har en dedikerad konsultchef som stötta dig och din utveckling. Vi hjälper dig hitta nya vägar genom att prova på nya roller och nya branscher, för oss är det viktigt att du trivs på din arbetsplats. Vi ser till att du hamnar på ett bra bolag under ditt uppdrag och att uppdragen ligger i linje med hur du vill utvecklas framöver.
   

  

 Oavsett vad det blir, står vi bakom dig hela vägen – i alla stegen som kommer. Gå med i vårt team och ta del av en spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö!
   

  

**Vill du vara med på vår resa? Läs mer om oss, vår kultur och våra värderingar på vår karriärsida.**
 ANSÖKAN
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar får du gärna höra av dig till Marina Malesevic på marina.malesevic@wiseit.se. Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Hoppas vi ses snart ! 🌻

title: Android Engineer
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?**
 Truecaller transformed how we communicate when we launched in 2009 in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Our mission is to build trust everywhere by making tomorrow’s communication smarter, safer and more efficient. We focus on bringing smart services with big social impacts, like protecting people from fraud, harassment, and scam calls or messages. We identify new numbers from anywhere in the world and build a space for trustworthy conversations, for those that matter. Truecaller is loved by over 350 million people around the world and is growing very rapidly across regions.
   

  

**Who we are:**
* The world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS.
* A team of 400 people from :35 different nationalities, spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon, Tel Aviv and Nairobi.
* Listed On Nasdaq OMX Stockholm, Large Cap


 Tasks
   

  

**What Will You Work On**
* Write simple, understandable, testable, and efficient code with a focus on solid technical stability and great user experience.
* Drive technical improvement by applying software craftsmanship in everyday work as well as by identifying and executing larger refactoring/improvement initiatives.
* Contribute in implementation of complex features and design work.
* Being part of cross team technical projects
* Participate in and contribute to the team’s Agile practices.
* Implement unit tests within the team’s responsibility area.
* Take responsibility in maintaining high engineering standards, commitment to the product and respect and attitude towards others.nd respect and attitude towards others.


**Requirements**
**What do we expect from you**
* Strong knowledge of the Android SDK (minimum 2 years of experience)
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs
* Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
* Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
* Fluent in English, in speaking and writing
* Experience in working with Agile methodologies
* Ability to make the right compromises to maximize early value delivery without compromising on quality


**It would be great if you also have**
* Exposure to google billing library
* Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices as well as an eye for design
* Knowledge of gRPC


**Benefits**
**What we offer:**
* A smart, talented and agile team: An international team where :35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing and fun environment.
* A great compensation package: Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance and pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, gym membership.
* Great tech tools: Pick the computer and phone that you fancy the most within our budget ranges.
* Do it your way: We work in-office on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays with flexibility on the other days. You can enjoy 3 weeks working remotely from anywhere you want per year.
* Office life: Enjoy your days with a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages, and have fun at our playroom! As well, exciting company parties and team activities such as Lab days, Running team, Geek lunch!


**Life at Truecaller -** 
 Behind the code:
 **https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/**
**Sounds like your dream job?**
 We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check. We are excited to hear from you, don’t hesitate to apply!
   

  

**This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.**
 We only accept applications
 **in English** 
 .
   

  

**Come as you are:**
 Truecaller is diverse, equal and inclusive. We need a wide variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs and experiences in order to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc.
 **All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you.**

title: Junior Full stack Engineer
description:
We are a fast-growing gaming and health startup from Stockholm that engages online gamers through physical activities.
 



  





 With gaming as the world’s largest leisure activity and the average 10-year-old spending over 7 hours daily on screens outside school, we see a transformative opportunity. By combining the right infrastructure, platform, and community, we are redefining gaming to drive a massive impact on youth health.
 



  





 We partner with cities to create free-to-access spaces where gaming meets physical activity and develop technology that encourages exercise in exchange for screen time. Activities range from simple tasks like walking to joining football tournaments at our facilities or completing AI-powered challenges like 50 jumping jacks at home. Upon completion, users earn screen time credits to use in our arenas, on their phones, or at their gaming PCs. Our gamification platform drives engagement and serves as the gateway to our vibrant community for partners.
 



  





**Why is this interesting?** 




 The mental and physical health of today’s youth is steadily declining, while gaming and screen time are growing at an unprecedented rate. Since the 1930s, public infrastructure has supported sports, yet no equivalent exists for gaming—even though its audience now far exceeds that of traditional sports. In Sweden, municipalities prioritize public health, and many have underutilized facilities that, with creativity and technology, could help communities become more active and healthier. Meanwhile, parents worldwide face challenges managing their children’s screen time, and brands like Nike, Lego, EA Games, and Microsoft are seeking meaningful ways to connect with younger generations.
 



  





 We bridge these gaps by uniting municipalities, private sector leaders, and parents in a shared mission to improve youth health. Through cutting-edge technology and reimagined infrastructure, we create spaces and platforms where communities can thrive physically, socially, and digitally.
 



  





 Now, we’re looking for a
 **junior frontend oriented Fullstack Engineer** 
 to take this mission to the next level. If you’re passionate about creating technology that has a real potential to empower and transform lives, we need you.
 



  





 The ideal candidate:
 


* Brings full-stack expertise with a focus on frontend and UI design
* Has passion for delivering consumer-facing mobile applications, and ideally, Windows applications too.
* Have worked with JavaScript stack (specifically React Native, React, Node.js)
* Passion for AI and startups



  





 The compensation for the role includes Stock options (equity) + salary as you're joining the core-team of a early-stage startup from the ground up.
 



  





 So, if you're looking to join a disruptive startup making an impact on health of next generation and grow with it, please apply here.

title: ServiceNow Administrator
description:
Job Title: ServiceNow Administrator
   

  

* Company: BluEdge
* Location: Stockholm (SE)
* Max Price rate (SEK/h): Openbid
* Start date: 03 Feb 2025
* End date (renewable): 29 Aug 2025


 The ServiceNow Administrator will be part of the "Process & Delivery Support" group within the IT department at BluEdge. The role involves supporting the development of sustainable solutions and driving change and management activities within the ServiceNow platform. The administrator will collaborate with the solution architect, platform and process managers, and engage in dialogue with the business regarding support. Responsibilities include handling support cases, incidents, managing foundation data for the platform, technical configuration and management of implemented solutions, problem root cause analysis, communication and management of knowledge articles, performance monitoring, data analysis, patch management and upgrade coordination, and acting as a Scrum Master to some extent.
   

  

**Requirements**
* At least 1 year of experience in managing the ServiceNow platform
* Experience in process support systems within ServiceNow
* Proficiency in 'Best Practices' from ServiceNow
* Strong ability and experience in incident analysis and understanding of Problem Root cause analysis
* Experience with SaaS platform architecture and traditional IT infrastructure
* Familiarity with ITIL and SAFe frameworks
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English
* Meticulous, responsible, committed, and a desire to learn and collaborate with stakeholders and team members

title: PHP Developer
description:
Do you want to help us unleash the secret to how happy employees create a happy business? We are an innovative, agile, and continuously growing modern tech company on a path to improving the work lives of millions around the world.
   

  

**We develop workforce management solutions** 
 - software that makes scheduling and time reporting more smooth and more flexible for almost a million users worldwide!
   

  

****We value passion, quality, innovation, trust, and collaboration** 
 .** 
 You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas, and have full ownership of your area.
   

  

 Our global team, of more than 35 nationalities, have fun together, whether it is during a typical Swedish Fika, a workshop, going for a run with a colleague, or spending time together during team kickoffs, or after-work socials. We have built a collaborative and friendly atmosphere here at Quinyx and are committed to sharing knowledge and supporting one another!
   

  

 Are you curious and ready to take the first steps on an awesome journey and make magic happen with us? As a member of Quinyx, you will be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace where everyone is allowed to be themselves and thrive.
   

  

**We have a hybrid working set up and therefore you will be required to attend our Stockholm** 
**office twice per week.**
**About The Role**
 We are looking for an experienced PHP developer with a strong technical background to join our fantastic Core team.
   

  

 You will work in the Core team as a PHP developer, creating new features, API endpoints, fixing bugs, and refactoring existing functionality.
   

  

 The team consists of seven PHP developers and two QA members working together.
   

  

 In our project ecosystem, apart from PHP services, we also have services built with Java, so you will have the opportunity to work with new technologies and learn new skills.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Working in a self-managing team based on Agile principles
* Implementing new and maintaining existing functionality in our services built with pure PHP and Laravel
* Refactoring codebase to enhance performance and security
* Participating in planning, discovering solutions and initiating innovations


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* Multiple years of experience in PHP development
* Skills in high-performance scalable system development
* Strong set of soft skills, including effective communication, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities.
* Excellent English, both spoken and written


**The WOW-factor**
* Knowledge of Java, Cloud technologies, and experience with high-loaded systems is a plus.
* You enjoy working in a highly independent, cross-functional team with a never-ending drive to deliver great software, with a special focus on performance, maintainability, and usability. You achieve this by understanding our users' needs and cooperating effectively with the team.
* Experience with handling technical debt and working with legacy code is a plus.


**What’s in it for you?**
 We promote and encourage a healthy lifestyle with flexible work hours and the latest tools, enhanced vacation allowance, wellness, home office, professional development contributions, virtual yoga classes, and last but not least, you will have the chance to participate in our well-known yearly ping-pong tournament!
   

  

**Want to join Quinyx?**
 At Quinyx, we provide equal employment opportunities and strive for an inclusive, diverse, value-driven culture. All applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, disability, or veteran status.
   

  

**Happy Workforce, Happy Business!**
***All candidates are subject to background checks.***

title: Nätverkstekniker
description:
**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2025-01-30
 



  





  





*Svenska kraftnät är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Som Nätverkstekniker erbjuds du ett av Sveriges viktigaste IT-jobb, i vilket du varje dag kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning. Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige.* 




  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Svenska kraftnät står mitt i ett tekniskt generationsskifte som omfattar allt från digitala stamnätsstationer till avancerad kommunikation med andra europeiska stamnätsägare – och de behöver din expertis för att göra det möjligt.
 



  





 Som Nätverkstekniker blir du en del av ett erfaret och engagerat team om 20 personer som tillsammans ansvarar för drift och utveckling av såväl intern som extern infrastruktur – att gemensamt säkra nätverksmiljön. Du kommer att arbeta med alltifrån felsökning till övervakning och vidareutveckling av en mycket stor och komplex enterprise-miljö, där kraven på tillgänglighet och säkerhet är höga.
 



  





 Din roll är avgörande i arbetet att hålla Sveriges elförsörjning stabil och framtidssäkrad. Du får alla möjligheter att påverka en pågående teknisk förändringsresa och vara delaktig i lösningar som bidrar till att Sverige varken slocknar eller stannar.
 



  





**Om dig** 




 Vi söker dig som är både självgående och en lagspelare, med öga för förbättringar och förmåga att förankra dem genom samarbete. Du är trygg i din kunskap och vågar ta initiativ för att driva utveckling framåt, samtidigt som du värdesätter samarbete och bidrar på ett prestigelöst och hjälpsamt sätt. Du är strukturerad, värdesätter kvalitet i ditt arbete och är nyfiken på att lära dig både om befintliga miljöer och nya områden.
 



  





 Skallkrav:
 


* Flerårig erfarenhet av arbete inom en medelstor till stor nätverksmiljö som har haft fokus på hög upptid och tillgänglighet alternativt erfarenhet av rollen som senior nätverkskonsult, gärna inom offentlig sektor.
* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete inom high availability-milöjer
* Mycket goda kunskaper inom routing/switching (Cisco)
* Relevant utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt som vi bedömer är likvärdig.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och i skrift



  





 Meriterande:
 


* Relevanta certifieringar som CCNA, CCNP, CCIE
* Erfarenhet av att ha lett eller varit drivande i projekt, t.ex. LCM-hantering.



  





**Bra att veta** 



* Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm/Sundbyberg
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 % #LI-hybrid
* Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-01-30, vi tar inte emot personligt brev i samband med din ansökan.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med ev. beredskap
* **Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät**



  





 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Svenska kraftnät med IDG Recruitment.
 



  





 Vid frågor, kontakta rekryteringskonsult Alexandra Tihinen,
 **alexandra.tihinen@foundryco.com** 
 , 070-447 92 24 alternativt Maria Sahlén rekryterare hos Svenska kraftnät,
 **maria.sahlen2@svk.se** 
 , 010-489 20 27.
 



  





 Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim, ST, tel. 010-475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post:
 **fornamn.efternamn@svk.se** 
 .
 



  





**Övrig information** 




 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.

 **Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät**

title: Är du redo för nästa steg inom systemsäkerhet?
description:
Vill du vara med och skapa säkra, innovativa lösningar som skyddar människor, egendom och miljö?
 **MilDef** 
 , en global ledare inom ruggade IT-lösningar, söker nu en
 **Systemsäkerhetsingenjör** 
 till vårt team i Stockholm (Rosersberg). Ta chansen att bli en del av en bransch som gör skillnad – varje dag.
   

  

**Din nya utmaning**
 Som
 **Systemsäkerhetsingenjör** 
 på MilDef får du en nyckelroll i våra projekt. Du arbetar nära projektledare och konstruktörer för att säkerställa att våra produkter uppfyller högt ställda säkerhetskrav när det gäller att skydda människor, egendom och miljö. Med ett systematiskt arbetssätt bidrar du till att våra lösningar är trygga att använda, samtidigt som du utvecklas i en dynamisk miljö där ingen dag är den andra lik.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
* Identifiera och analysera risker i system och produkter.
* Säkerställa att säkerhetsföreskrifter och kundkrav uppfylls.
* Ta fram detaljerade rapporter och rekommendationer.
* Presentera tekniska lösningar på ett pedagogiskt och övertygande sätt.
* Delta i granskning av driftscenarier och tekniska dokument.
* Bidra vid eftermarknadstjänster som support och utbildning.
* Vara en viktig kontaktpunkt för kunder, exempelvis Försvarsmakten och FMV


**Det här bidrar du med** 
  

  

 För att trivas och lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har:
   

  

* En högskoleingenjörsutbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Grundläggande kunskaper i både hårdvara och mjukvara, gärna med fokus på systemsäkerhet.
* Förmåga att självständigt driva frågor framåt och förstå tekniska krav.
* Starka kommunikativa färdigheter och en känsla för detaljer.
* Erfarenhet av att använda Microsoft Office-paketet för att skapa rapporter och presentationer.
* Svenskt medborgarskap (tjänsten är säkerhetsklassad).
* Flytande svenska och engelska, samt körkort (resor förekommer).


**Varför MilDef**
 På MilDef erbjuder vi mer än bara en arbetsplats – här blir du en del av en kultur som präglas av innovation, samarbete och engagemang.
   

  

 Vad vi erbjuder dig
   

  

* Möjlighet att arbeta med projekt som bidrar till Sveriges försvar och nationella säkerhet.
* En inkluderande och stöttande arbetsmiljö där idéer värdesätts.
* Kontinuerligt lärande och utvecklingsmöjligheter.
* Förmåner som:
* Kollektivavtal
* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Regelbundna hälsoundersökningar
* Happiness-team som ordnar roliga aktivitete


**Låter det spännande?**
 Läs mer om oss på MilDef.com. För information om tjänsten, kontakta gärna Peter Kristiansson, Head of System engineering, på peter.kristiansson@mildef.com
   

  

 Skicka in din ansökan redan idag, vi jobbar med löpande urval! Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-01-05
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra ifrån dig!
   

  

***MilDef - WE ARMOR IT.***
*MilDef is a global systems integrator and full-spectrum provider specializing in rugged IT for military, government and critical infrastructure sectors. MilDef provides hardware, software, and services that shield and protect critical information streams and systems, when and where the stakes are the highest. MilDef’s products are sold to more than 200 customers through companies in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, United Kingdom, Germany, Switzerland, the United States and Australia, and through partner networks in more than 40 countries. MilDef was founded in 1997 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm since 2021.*
**We kindly decline contact from advertising and recruitment sales.**

title: Servertekniker (fokus lagring och backup)
description:
Nu har du möjlighet att bidra till vidareutvecklingen av samhällskritisk infrastruktur i en verksamhet där varje sekund gör skillnad.
 **Teracom Samhällsnät** 
 söker en
 **servertekniker med fokus på lagring- och backuplösningar** 
 . Var med och gör Sverige tryggare där det behövs, när det behövs.
 



  





 Teracom Samhällsnät levererar ett brett och specialiserat utbud av kommunikationstjänster med fokus på säkerhet, robusthet och yttäckning inklusive ansvar för utsändning av tv och radio samt VMA (Viktigt Meddelande till Allmänheten) över marknätet och drift av Rakel det digitala radiokommunikationssystem som används av bland annat polis, räddningstjänst, sjukvård och försvarsmakt.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Vi söker dig som vill arbeta i en samhällsviktig verksamhet med höga krav på tillgänglighet, säkerhet och robusthet. Du erbjuds en mycket formbar roll där du har alla möjligheter att bidra till de tekniska valen och göra avtryck på framtidens IT-infrastruktur.'
 



  





 Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:
 


* Utveckling och livscykelhantering av Teracoms plattformar med särskilt fokus på lagring- och backuplösningar (NetApp) men även Linux, VMware och övriga infrarelaterade system
* Arbete med att upprätthålla funktion och drift varvat med automatisering, vidareutveckling och framtagning av nya plattformar och tekniker
* Hantera alltifrån installation och övervakning till driftsättning, felsökning, konfigurering och optimering av tekniska miljöer, med stort fokus på säkerhet (störst fokus är driftmiljö on-prem, i egna datahallar)
* Medverka i pågående och kommande förändrings- och utvecklingsprojekt där du bidrar med ditt kompetensområde, exempelvis i utformning av framtidens IT-infrastruktur
* Omvärldsbevaka och vara delaktig i att driva tekniken framåt



  





 Du kommer vara del av avdelningen IT Infrastruktur, bestående av erfarna, engagerade och samarbetsorienterade kollegor.
 



  





 Placeringsort är Stockholm, med en hybrid arbetsmodell.
 



  





**Är det här du?** 




 Vi söker dig som har några års aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet inom lagrings- och backuplösningar (NetApp) samt inom Linux och VMware.
 



  





 Meriterande är erfarenhet inom IT-säkerhet samt av samhälls- och/eller verksamhetskritiska system, liksom relevant eftergymnasial utbildning.
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. För att trivas och vara framgångsrik i rollen ser vi att du bör vara prestigelös, hjälpsam och ha god samarbetsförmåga. Vidare trivs du bra med komplex problemlösning och har en god förmåga att finna lösningar och nå resultat. Du är nyfiken och initativtagande.
 



  





**Övrig** 
**information** 




 För anställning krävs att godkänd drog- och alkoholtest genomförs och att godkänd bakgrundskontroll liksom godkänd säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll genomförs, detta eftersom anställningen innefattar säkerhetsklassning. Med anledning av detta krävs även svenskt alternativt nordiskt medborgarskap.
 



  





**Anställningsform:** 
 Tillsvidaretjänst
 



**Beredskap:** 
 Valbart
 



**Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm (Lindhagensgatan 122) (hybrid arbetsmodell)
 



  





**Intresserad av att ansöka eller få veta mer?** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Teracom Samhällsnät med IDG Recruitment. Vid intresse eller frågor kontakta Alexandra Tihinen, Rekryteringskonsult på 070-447 92 24,
 **alexandra.tihinen@foundryco.com** 
 .
 



  





 För att ansöka, vänligen skicka in ditt CV eller ansök med Linkedin.
 



  





**Om** 
**Teracom** 




*Ett land ska leva överallt, oavsett – i glesbygd eller i storstad, vid kriser och omvälvande händelser. Det är just därför Teracom Samhällsnät finns.* 




  





*Teracom Samhällsnät bidrar till ett tryggare samhälle genom att våra tjänster ser till att information och kommunikation kan fungera för de allra viktigaste samhällsfunktionerna även i kris och krig. Våra uppdrag inkluderar utsändningen av public servicekanalerna för radio och tv, beredskapsuppdraget Viktigt Meddelande till Allmänheten och ansvaret för kommunikationssystemet Rakel (det svenska blåljusnätet). Vi utvecklar och levererar också allt fler beredskapstjänster samt olika typer av kommunikationslösningar till totalförsvarsviktiga aktörer. Vi är ett statligt bolag och i Sverige är vi ca 500 medarbetare som finns på ca 50 orter i landet. Vår vision är att vi, i samarbete med våra uppdragsgivare, ska göra Sverige tryggare där det behövs, när det behövs. Läs mer hos* 
***Teracom***
*.*

title: Head of Product Development - Tietoevry Care (m/f/d)
description:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.
At Tietoevry Care you’ll get a chance to provide citizens and end users with product offerings that help them in their life, reinventing the world for good. If that sounds interesting, please keep on reading.
About us
Tietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modern, modular, and open software. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.
We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors within health and welfare. We have our own product portfolio that we develop for various fields in society. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and the wellbeing of people in need*.*
Lifecare is the market leading Welfare system in Sweden and Norway. Our products are developed in close cooperation with the leading healthcare and social care professionals and domain experts. Now we are taking the next steps to expand products and reach new Nordic markets.
About the role
Do you want to work with a modern product portfolio for the next generation of offering to our welfare industry and society? Do you have experience of leading strategic development initiatives and working in a cross-county organization? Do you have strong leadership skills and experience of leading a big development organization located in several countries?
As part of our growth strategy, we are seeking a dynamic and experienced Head of Development to drive our development efforts to continue to expand our business towards the Swedish and Norwegian market. Our company is growing, and now we are looking for great people to join us!
As the Head of Development, you will lead the development of our software products globally together with our teams in Sweden, Poland, Norway and India with dotted line managerial reports. The role is both strategic and operational, requiring a blend of technical expertise, leadership skills, and business acumen. In this position, you will be responsible for strategic planning, continuous improvement, quality assurance, and efficiency management in our product development process.
You will report to the Head of Welfare, be a member of the leadership team, and collaborate closely with Head of Operations and colleagues in the Leadership team as well as our managers, staff and people leads in different settings to ensure strategic decisions identified and executed seamlessly.
With us, you will:* Set a strategic direction for development initiatives to align with the organization's goals.
* Lead and mentoring an international, multi-site product development organization to develop market-leading, high-quality products and solutions.
* Define a vision and strategy for software engineering methodologies, workflows, and developer experience.
* Strengthen our way of working by aligning tools, processes and our technical frameworks.
* Drive continuous improvement in our DevOps practices.
* Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) for projects and teams.
* Foster cooperation and networking within our business unit, together with other business units and with internal and external technology partners.


For this role, we appreciate if you have the following:* Experience in building complex solutions and cloud-based systems in demanding, large-scale environments.
* Technical background with hands-on coding experience.
* Strong strategic leadership skills with the ability to build, motivate and manage a high-performing organization and to drive change management.
* Good communication skills, both technical and non-technical, and experience from stakeholder management and deliver material for decisions.
* English fluency, both written and oral.


As a person you are
You are highly engaged and interested in driving and developing the organization forward. Always eager to learn more and enjoy sharing and increasing your knowledge while working with others. You get motivated by achieving results and like to work together with others as well as independently.
You are good at expressing yourself in writing and in meetings.You also have a solution-oriented mindset and ability to prioritize and drive your work.
As a person you are a good communicator with a positive attitude and a sense of teamwork.
We offer
We offer you an exciting and challenging role in a prominent organization within the municipal market industry. You will get opportunities for learning and developing in a team-oriented organization. You will cooperate with colleagues in an international and evolving working environment and get the opportunity to develop your professional skills together with others.
If you have experience in strategic leadership within the area of product development, this is a great opportunity for you to take the next step in your career.
For further information
Did we get you inspired? We look forward to hearing from you! For additional information about the role, please contact
Malin Johansson, malin.b.johansson@tietoevry.com or
Unni Kvisvik, unni.kvisvik@tietoevry.com*We perform background checks on all final candidates.**Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies.*
About Tietoevry
Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.
#LI-Hybrid
#LI-AS5
At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Senior DevOps Engineer - Azure & Service Fabric Expertise
description:
We’re looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer who thrives on solving complex challenges in automation, scalability, and reliability. Join us to build systems that make a real difference. **This role in our team**  

As a Senior DevOps Engineer in our team, you’ll be shaping the future of energy insights. Joining our innovative team means leveraging your expertise with Azure, Service Fabric, and C# to scale and optimize cloud infrastructure that powers smarter energy management for millions. **What you’ll do:*** Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines for our Azure-based applications.
* Optimize and manage Service Fabric clusters for high availability and performance.
* Collaborate with developers to automate deployments and enhance system reliability.
* Write clean, maintainable scripts and tools in C# to support infrastructure needs.
* Monitor, troubleshoot, and improve our cloud environment’s performance and security.

 **Who we are looking for:*** Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer, with a focus on Azure and Service Fabric.
* Strong programming skills in C# with a solid understanding of software development.
* Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools like Azure DevOps or equivalent.
* Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
* Knowledge of Cassandra and other databases is a strong advantage.
* A problem-solving mindset with a drive for innovation and efficiency.

 **About Eliq:**  

Eliq is a leading company in the energy insights space , serving 30+ utilities across 13 European markets. Founded in 2015, Eliq is a VC-backed business with approximately 40 employees. We are dedicated to improving the way energy is used by making sense of the world’s energy data, enabling businesses to build digital energy products and users to avoid energy wastage. Join us in fast-tracking the planet’s transition to net zero. **Why join us?**

* Joining Eliq means playing a pivotal role in shaping the future of our team and culture..
* Attractive salary and benefits package.
* An opportunity to be part of a market making company in the key growth phase.


Privacy Notice: Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By applying for this position, you agree to the processing of your personal data as described. For more details, please review our full privacy policy.

title: Senior Cloud & DevOps Engineer
description:
- **Är du en duktig molningenjör som älskar att nörda ner dig i både tekniska lösningar och molnmigrering? Då kan Devoteam M Cloud vara platsen för dig!**  

  

Är du redo att ta på dig din mantel och delta i äventyret?
  

Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
  

  

**Devoteam** är ett ledande internationellt konsultföretag som arbetar med digitala transformationer. Vi har över 10 000 kollegor i 20 länder. I den här rollen får du jobba från vårt nya fräscha kontor i Malmö, i ett svensk team mot stora Norska kunder.
  

  

Vi på **Devoteam M Cloud** är specialiserade på Microsoft Azure och blev bland annat utsedda till Partner of the Year (Norge) av Microsoft 2023. Vi söker nu fler duktiga kollegor som vill vara med och skapa fantastiska molnresor för våra kunder. Hos oss möter du en miljö som inte bara handlar om teknisk innovation, utan också om att ha roligt på jobbet! Våra medarbetare brinner för att leverera de bästa lösningarna inom Azure, optimering och modernisering.

  
**Ansvar**

* Utveckling av infrastruktur som kod (IaC) och automatisering av manuella processer och distributioner.
* Underhålla och utveckla kundrelationer.
* Anpassa dig till oväntade utmaningar och hitta de bästa lösningarna för kunden.
* Utföra uppgifter enligt kundens interna processer och respektera deras arbetsmetoder.
* Utveckla och implementera infrastrukturtjänster i Azure

  
**Kvalifikationer**  

  

Den rätta kandidaten bör ha kunskap och erfarenhet av Azure infrastruktur, och ha en förståelse och erfarenhet av GitHub (GitHub Actions) eller liknande CI/CD-verktyg.
  

Du behöver ha praktisk erfarenhet av minst ett av följande:


* Terraform/Bicep og Powershell
* Det är bra med erfarenhet från något programmeringsspråk (C++, Python, Ansible, Javascript etc.).
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att jobba med Infrastruktur som kod (IaC) och script
* Minst 3 års praktisk erfarenhet med molntjänster (Azure, AWS og Google Cloud)
Kunskap om Azure-infrastruktur  
* 

  

**Personliga egenskaper**

* Du har ett strukturerat arbetssätt och förmåga att se både helheten och detaljerna
* Du är lösningsorienterad och har en proaktiv inställning till problemlösning
* Stark förmåga att samarbeta, samtidigt som du tycker om att arbeta självständigt
* Du är nyfiken på ny teknik och vill ständigt utveckla din kompetens

  
- **Vi erbjuder:**


	* Möjligheten att arbeta i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö med spännande kunder och projekt
	* Konkurrenskraftiga villkor och utvecklingsmöjligheter inom både teknik och karriär
	* En professionell miljö där kunskapsdelning och kontinuerligt lärande är en del av kulturen
	* Tillgång till de senaste tekniska verktygen och plattformarna för att effektivt lösa komplexa utmaningarHos oss får du möjlighet att använda din expertis för att bygga framtidens
  

dataplattformar, samtidigt som du arbetar nära innovativa projekt som skapar mätbara
  

resultat. Vi söker en person som är redo för nya utmaningar och som vill utvecklas vidare i en spännande och framtidsorienterad miljö.
  

**Är det här du? Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!**
